title: Tying Tempest
description: Tempest is true to her name, stormy and hard to hold. Her blood boils when she sees a risqu√© sculpture of a woman in bondage, blindfolded and submitting to her Master. Little does she realize as she reacts that the sculptor, handsome as sin Aidan Phillips, is standing right behind her.Aidan, a sexual Dominant, determines he will have her in his bed, on his terms. Tempest vows she will never yield, but the harder she resists, the more her body craves to yield. Aidan will possess her body and teach her to writhe in his loving ropes.But what happens when the stakes are raised from a mere night of slavish ecstasy to a possible lifetime commitment? Can Aidan tie Tempest for good, or will both their hearts be broken?
author: Reese Gabriel
